title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
plot: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.
stars: Jon Watts, Tom Holland, Zendaya, Benedict Cumberbatch, Jacob Batalon

title: The Godfather
plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.
stars: Francis Ford Coppola, Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Diane Keaton

title: The Dark Knight
plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
stars: Christopher Nolan, Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine

title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
stars: Frank Darabont, Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler

title: Avengers: Endgame
plot: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
stars: Anthony Russo, Joe Russo, Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth

title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
stars: Quentin Tarantino, John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson, Bruce Willis

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
stars: Christopher Nolan, Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain, Mackenzie Foy

title: The Dark Knight Rises
plot: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.
stars: Christopher Nolan, Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway, Gary Oldman

title: Joker
plot: A mentally troubled stand-up comedian embarks on a downward spiral that leads to the creation of an iconic villain.
stars: Todd Phillips, Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy

title: The Godfather: Part II
plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.
stars: Francis Ford Coppola, Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton

title: Parasite
plot: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
stars: Bong Joon Ho, Kang-ho Song, Sun-kyun Lee, Yeo-jeong Cho, Choi Woo-sik

title: Braveheart
plot: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.
stars: Mel Gibson, Sophie Marceau, Patrick McGoohan, Angus Macfadyen

title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.
stars: Christopher Nolan, Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page, Ken Watanabe

title: Fight Club
plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.
stars: David Fincher, Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Meat Loaf, Zach Grenier

title: Requiem for a Dream
plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.
stars: Darren Aronofsky, Ellen Burstyn, Jared Leto, Jennifer Connelly, Marlon Wayans

title: Avengers: Infinity War
plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.
stars: Anthony Russo, Joe Russo, Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Evans

title: Inglourious Basterds
plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.
stars: Quentin Tarantino, Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger, Eli Roth, Mélanie Laurent

title: Django Unchained
plot: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.
stars: Quentin Tarantino, Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio, Kerry Washington

title: Goodfellas
plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.
stars: Martin Scorsese, Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta, Joe Pesci, Lorraine Bracco

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
stars: Peter Jackson, Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom, Sean Bean

title: The Green Mile
plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
stars: Frank Darabont, Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse, Bonnie Hunt

title: Se7en
plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.
stars: David Fincher, Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt, Kevin Spacey, Andrew Kevin Walker

title: Whiplash
plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.
stars: Damien Chazelle, Miles Teller, J.K. Simmons, Melissa Benoist, Paul Reiser

title: Forrest Gump
plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
stars: Robert Zemeckis, Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise, Sally Field

title: Gladiator
plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
stars: Ridley Scott, Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen, Oliver Reed

title: Schindler's List
plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
stars: Steven Spielberg, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley, Caroline Goodall

title: The Silence of the Lambs
plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
stars: Jonathan Demme, Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Lawrence A. Bonney, Kasi Lemmons

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
plot: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.
stars: Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman, Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld, Mahershala Ali

title: The Matrix
plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
stars: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski, Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving

title: Star Wars
plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.
stars: George Lucas, Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness

title: The Prestige
plot: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.
stars: Christopher Nolan, Christian Bale, Hugh Jackman, Scarlett Johansson, Michael Caine

title: Saving Private Ryan
plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
stars: Steven Spielberg, Tom Hanks, Matt Damon, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns

title: Apocalypse Now
plot: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.
stars: Francis Ford Coppola, Martin Sheen, Marlon Brando, Robert Duvall, Frederic Forrest

title: Good Will Hunting
plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.
stars: Gus Van Sant, Robin Williams, Matt Damon, Ben Affleck, Stellan Skarsgård

title: American Beauty
plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.
stars: Sam Mendes, Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Wes Bentley

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
plot: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.
stars: Michel Gondry, Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Tom Wilkinson, Gerry Robert Byrne

title: The Departed
plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
stars: Martin Scorsese, Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson, Mark Wahlberg

title: Léon: The Professional
plot: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.
stars: Luc Besson, Jean Reno, Gary Oldman, Natalie Portman, Danny Aiello

title: Back to the Future
plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.
stars: Robert Zemeckis, Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson, Crispin Glover

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
stars: Peter Jackson, Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom

title: Alien
plot: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.
stars: Ridley Scott, Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, John Hurt, Veronica Cartwright

title: 12 Angry Men
plot: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.
stars: Sidney Lumet, Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb, Martin Balsam, John Fiedler

title: The Shining
plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.
stars: Stanley Kubrick, Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd, Scatman Crothers

title: The Usual Suspects
plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.
stars: Bryan Singer, Kevin Spacey, Gabriel Byrne, Chazz Palminteri, Stephen Baldwin

title: The Lion King
plot: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
stars: Roger Allers, Rob Minkoff, Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones, Whoopi Goldberg

title: Spirited Away
plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.
stars: Hayao Miyazaki, Daveigh Chase, Suzanne Pleshette, Miyu Irino, Rumi Hiiragi

title: Memento
plot: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.
stars: Christopher Nolan, Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss, Joe Pantoliano, Mark Boone Junior

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
plot: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.
stars: Milos Forman, Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Michael Berryman, Peter Brocco

title: Aliens
plot: Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel by merciless space creatures, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and tries to warn anyone who will listen about the predators.
stars: James Cameron, Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn, Carrie Henn, Paul Reiser

title: Lawrence of Arabia
plot: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.
stars: David Lean, Peter O'Toole, Alec Guinness, Anthony Quinn, Jack Hawkins
